readable.title: 3484820303_7be0e914b4
readable.content: A boy is on a bicycle , and there is a girl on the back of it with an umbrella . A couple stands outside with an umbrella and a bicycle . A girl with an umbrella is riding on the back of a bicycle peddled by a smiling boy . A man rides a bike with a woman holding an umbrella . There is a boy on a bicycle ; and a girl , holding an umbrella , climbing on the back .
